DOC.brief_summary: To compare by neuroimaging techniques the way Social Anxiety patients respond to public speaking before and after a drug administration
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Compare Emotional Changes In Subjects With Social Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Outpatient with Social Anxiety Disorder The subject is healthy Willing to restrict alcohol intake Capable of giving informed consent Exclusion criteria: Subjects with depression or any other psychiatric condition Subjects positive for HIV or hepatitis Subjects taking drugs or other medication Pregnant or becoming pregnant during the study Subjects who have donated blood Subjects who are lefthanded Subjects with claustrophobia Subjects with an electronic device or ferromagnetic metal foreign body
